alert.note: Alert for Dane; Jefferson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 2:19PM CDT until July 05 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Dane County in south central Wisconsin... Southwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 219 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cambridge, or 7 miles north of Edgerton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Atkinson, Jefferson, Lake Mills, Edgerton, Johnson Creek, Cambridge, Lake Ripley, Lake Koshkonong, Albion, Milford, Utica, Rockdale, and Busseyville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
